entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this morning. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 45 this morning and minus 39 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 41. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 41. Wind chill minus 43 this evening and minus 55 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 38.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming west 20 early in the afternoon. High minus 38. Wind chill minus 57 in the morning and minus 49 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023
